summary.para: Represents a Windows Forms List Editor that displays data in the form of a tree-like structure.

summary.para: Specifies whether the focused object can be deselected by clicking on the TreeListEditor's region not occupied by a node.

member.value: true, if the focused object can be deselected by clicking on the TreeListEditor's region not occupied by a node; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

summary.para: Indicates whether deferred node loading is enabled.

member.value: true, if the deferred node loading is enabled; otherwise, false. The default is true.
